item.title: The end of October often rewards stock investors with this profitable trade
item.description: Many institutional investors close their fiscal year on Oct. 31 and buy stocks at that time with excess cash.

item.title: Buyers of Russian oil now risk playing a high-stakes poker game, as fresh sanctions on Moscow lift prices

item.title: Why Ford is doubling down on the F-150 — and redeploying EV workers
item.description: Ford is adding extra workers and taking other measures to meet “strong” customer demand for its F-Series pickup trucks, while making up for production...

item.title: These low-risk stocks could be a profitable answer to this volatile earnings season
item.description: Slow and steady performers do better over the long term.

item.title: Intel’s stock is climbing as earnings show a turnaround slowly taking hold
item.description: The company topped revenue expectations and said it’s “having a difficult time meeting all the demand that’s out there” because of supply constraints.
